title: Anglers
medium: pen and ink and wash over pencil on paper
inscriptions: on mount l.c. in pencil: Anglers.; l.c. in blue crayon: E. R. Butler; verso mount, stamped: PROPERTY OF THE CENTURY CO.,/ Union Square, New York./ NOTICE TO ENGRAVERS...; verso center in blue crayon: Butler, E.R./ W/ 7 x 9/ Anglers-Paris/ 27-83
